Description: Dark red pottery ostracon, from the body of the vessel, interior grooved and covered with traces of a grey-black deposit, exterior covered with remains of fourteen lines of black-painted demotic text.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (389788) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/389788)
Acquisition name: Purchased through: R J Moss & Co
